Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-2398 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-14
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-2398 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-14. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.21.4-14, affected by CVE-2024-2398
